definitions.definition: An exchange of goods or services for currency or credit.
definitions.example: He celebrated after the sale of company.

definitions.definition: (Short for discount sale) The sale of goods at reduced prices.
definitions.example: They are having a clearance sale: 50% off.

definitions.definition: The act of putting up for auction to the highest bidder.
The activities involved in selling goods or services.
definitions.example: He's likable and motivated: perfect for a career in sales.

definitions.definition: The amount or value of goods and services sold.
definitions.example: Sales were up 12% over last year.
